en: We received a large package.

en: Only a handful of activists in our union are getting on our backs.

en: Only a handful of activists in our union are getting on us.

en: Our progress was put in check.

en: It's very hard to get rid of the cockroaches in our house.

en: What we need now is action, not discussion.

en: Please allow us to do the work.

en: You probably already know about our company.

en: We are subscribed to the Asahi paper.
